.table baseEdge
----
application/datalog

baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "baseEdge", output: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}}, step: 0}.

baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "baseEdge", output: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}}, step: 0}.

baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "baseEdge", output: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}}, step: 0}.

edge{from: F, to: T} :-
  baseEdge{from: F, to: T} |
  baseEdge{from: F, to: I} & edge{from: I, to: T}.
----
application/datalog

edge{from: F, to: T}?
----
application/datalog
edge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
edge{from: "A", to: "C"}.
edge{from: "A", to: "D"}.
edge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
edge{from: "B", to: "D"}.
edge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
